name: Caltrain
description: Peninsula commuter rail with bike parking and station amenities
fullDescription: Caltrain is a commuter rail line serving the San Francisco Peninsula and Santa Clara Valley, running from San Francisco to Gilroy. Stations offer bike parking, car parking, and transit connections.
whatTheyOffer:
- Commuter rail service from SF to Gilroy
- BikeLink e-lockers at most stations (5Â¢/hour)
- Parking at most stations ($5.50/day or $82.50/month)
- Free parking at stations south of San Jose Diridon
- Accessible stations with elevators at select locations
- Restrooms at SF, San Jose Diridon, and pilot stations
howToGetIt:
1. Plan your trip at caltrain.com
2. Buy tickets at station vending machines or use Clipper card
3. BikeLink e-lockers: Download BikeLink app for 100+ free hours
4. Parking: Pay at ticket machine or via ParkMobile app
5. Bikes allowed on all trains in designated cars
keywords: Caltrain, commuter rail, Peninsula, San Francisco, San Jose, Gilroy, BikeLink, parking, Clipper, train
